scripts.build-all: env-cmd ./.env.local npm run build-contracts && env-cmd ./.env.local npm run build-bundles
scripts.build-bundles: env-cmd ./.env.local npm run build && gulp --preserve-symlinks --gulpfile scripts/bundle.js
scripts.test:services: env-cmd ./.env.local npm run build && env-cmd ./.env.local mocha --exit --inspect -r ts-node/register src/claims/*.spec.ts src/dfs/*.spec.ts src/encryption/*.spec.ts src/profile/*.spec.ts src/*.spec.ts
scripts.test:contracts: env-cmd ./.env.local npm run build && env-cmd ./.env.local mocha --exit --inspect -r ts-node/register src/contracts/*.spec.ts src/contracts/base-contract/*.spec.ts src/contracts/business-center/*.spec.ts src/contracts/service-contract/*.spec.ts
scripts.test:datacontract: env-cmd ./.env.local npm run build && env-cmd ./.env.local mocha --exit --inspect -r ts-node/register src/contracts/data-contract/*.spec.ts
scripts.testunit: env-cmd ./.env.local npm run build && env-cmd ./.env.local mocha --exit --inspect -r ts-node/register $*
scripts.testunitcoverage: env-cmd ./.env.local npm run build && nyc -r lcov -e .ts -x "$TESTSPECS" mocha --exit -r ts-node/register $TESTSPECS && nyc report --reporter=text-lcov | coveralls
scripts.testunitbail: env-cmd ./.env.local npm run build && env-cmd ./.env.local mocha --exit -b --inspect -r ts-node/register $*
scripts.testunitbrk: env-cmd ./.env.local npm run build && env-cmd ./.env.local mocha --exit --inspect-brk -r ts-node/register $*
